title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Stunning jobs report rocks media, Democrats. They keep firing rubber bullets at Trump, do no damage. Health experts: Social justice more important than social distancing. Liberalism has made everything worse than ever. Democrats distract from 50 years of failed liberalism, go back 400 years, blame America. Daniel Henninger column on nihilism. Roaring economic comeback Trump predicted, with no help from New York and California. Red states carrying the water. Politico tweet before jobs report couldn't have been more wrong. Biggest jobs report in history. Rush's tribute to Kathryn on their tenth anniversary. Rush health update. Turn off the media for a week to feel better.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Where the jobs came from. Obama speech was a bomb. African-American unemployment improved in May, contrary to Drive-By Media reports. If you watch the news, you'll feel pessimistic and outnumbered. Liberalism has failed to deliver on any of the promises of the last 50 years. Protests are demonstrations against failed blue state Democrats. Democrats have to blame "systemic racism" because they've failed to make life better for African-Americans. Liberals want to get rid of cops because, if there are cops there will be no arrests, and if there are no arrests, they can pretend there is no crime. Democrats blame Republicans for their failures. Left's new nihilism. Rasmussen poll: Trump approval 40% with likely black voters. Dyslexic Rush Revere fan thanks Rush.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

States with no job growth. The news cycle will break our way eventually. If Black Lives Mattered to the left, would they tell African-Americans to go out and protest in a pandemic that hits them hardest? Democrats move to defund police all over the country. Democrat Party declares war on police and they think that's going to help Biden? Don't let weekend protests get you down. Survivor of '68 Detroit riots. Dr. Ben Carson calls the show, talks economy, protesters, leftists who want to change our system of government, coronavirus, the seduction of socialism. Sharpton hijacks Floyd protests. Rush's affectionate nickname for Tucker Carlson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
